00017 EndpointDelegate::EndpointDelegate(QObject *parent /*= 0*/ ) : QStyledItemDelegate(parent)
00018 {
00019 }

00023 
00024 QWidget* EndpointDelegate::createEditor(QWidget* parent, 
00025                                         const QStyleOptionViewItem& option, 
00026                                         const QModelIndex& index ) const
00027 {
00028     switch (index.column())
00029     {
00030     case 0:
00031         {
00032             // use line edit to edit all other columns
00033             QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00034             connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00035                     this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00036             return editor;
00037         }
00038 
00039     case 1:
00040         {
00041             QComboBox* combo = new QComboBox(parent);
00042             combo->addItem(QString("message"));
00043             combo->addItem(QString("packet"));
00044             combo->addItem(QString("scalar"));
00045             connect(combo, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00046                     this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00047             return combo;
00048         }
00049 
00050     case 2:
00051         {
00052             QComboBox* combo = new QComboBox(parent);
00053             combo->addItem(QString("in"));
00054             combo->addItem(QString("out"));
00055             connect(combo, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00056                 this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00057             return combo;
00058         }
00059 
00060     default: {
00061         return QStyledItemDelegate::createEditor(parent, option, index);
00062              }
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 void EndpointDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, const QModelIndex& index ) const
00067 {
00068     switch (index.column())
00069     {
00070     case 0:
00071         {
00072             // use the line edit for other columns
00073             QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00074             QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00075             lineEdit->setText(text);
00076             break;
00077         }
00078 
00079     case 1:
00080     case 2:
00081         {
00082             QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00083             QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00084 
00085             int comboIndex = combo->findText(text);
00086             combo->setCurrentIndex(comboIndex);
00087             break;
00088         }
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 void EndpointDelegate::setModelData(QWidget* editor, QAbstractItemModel* model,
00093                                     const QModelIndex& index) const
00094 {
00095     switch (index.column())
00096     {
00097     case 0:
00098         {
00099             // get the text from line edit for other columns
00100             QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00101             QString text = lineEdit->text();
00102             model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00103             break;
00104         }
00105 
00106     case 1:
00107     case 2:
00108         {
00109             QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00110             QString text = combo->currentText();
00111             model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00112             break;
00113         }
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 void EndpointDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00118 
00119     // try to get pointer to editor in both cases
00120     QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(sender());
00121     QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00122 
00123     // if the editor was combo box
00124     if (combo) {
00125         emit commitData(combo);
00126         emit closeEditor(combo);
00127     }
00128 
00129     // if editor was line edit
00130     else {
00131         emit commitData(lineEdit);
00132         emit closeEditor(lineEdit);
00133     }
00134 }
